author: RTÉ News
title: Covid-19 dictionary for kids (& those who need primer)
description: There are a lot of terms floating about in relation to Covid-19, so RTÉ's news2day has devised a dictionary for children - or for anyone who needs a primer.
content:
There are a lot of terms floating about in relation to Covid-19, the coronavirus that has been in the news since the beginning of 2020.
It can be hard to keep up with all the new words, so RTÉ's news2day has devised a dictionary for children - or anyone who … [+5562 chars]
